body_html:
It seems that I mistakenly forgot to pull __init__.py. Sorry about that.
To talk about LambdaLR, I believe that it is reasonable -- it is a common practice to use different base_lr for different params and meanwhile to apply the same scheduler. In this case, only one f is required.

body:
It seems that I mistakenly forgot to pull `__init__.py`. Sorry about that.
To talk about LambdaLR, I believe that it is reasonable -- it is a common practice to use different base_lr for different params and meanwhile to apply the same scheduler. In this case, only one f is required.
